mapper.select: select cname name,sum(num) value from class c, (select fname,claid,count(1) num from commodity c,fine f where f.finid = c.finid group by f.finid) f where c.claid = f.claid group by c.claid
SELECT sum(epro) value, epro name FROM employee GROUP BY epro
SELECT concat('level', mlevel), sum(1) FROM member GROUP BY mlevel
SELECT count(1) value, fname name FROM (SELECT finid, fname FROM fine WHERE claid = (SELECT claid FROM class WHERE cname = #{cname})) a, commodity c WHERE a.finid = c.finid GROUP BY c.finid
